Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, first off I want to start by saying that I don't own the rights to these models, I simple messed around with some config files and I am uploading the pack to save people the trouble of doing it themselves. Ok now that is out of the way lets get down to business.

This is my first mod type thing so go easy plz , anyway I have made two different types of parts. One normal sized radial engine but it acts as a solid rocket booster instead, and one half size radial engine as a booster.

Theses two engines are great for making quick escapes or to clear the way when ejecting a stage. I have made a video on my channel to demonstrate them both. I hope this helps some people make even better ships to explore the Kerbol solar system.

Video:

(remember model is owned by Squad not me)

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/24656223/RL%20Radial%20Boosters.zip

Sorry for the link, I couldn't add an attachment.
Good stuff Reckon you could do a jet version?
wow, did this make it's way into stock?
